mapper.select: SELECT c.*, u.real_name as studentName FROM sys_consultation c LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON c.student_id = u.id ORDER BY c.status ASC, c.create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_consultation SET reply = #{reply}, status = 1, reply_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_consultation (student_id, content, status, create_time) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{content}, 0, NOW())
